00030   //inOct1 and inOct2 must be globally sorted and complete
00031   int mergeOctrees(std::vector<TreeNode>& inOct1, std::vector<TreeNode>& inOct2,
00032       std::vector<TreeNode>& outOct, MPI_Comm comm) {
00033     PROF_MERGE_OCTREES_BEGIN
00034 
00035       int rank;
00036     int npes;
00037     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00038     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00039 
00040     assert(!(inOct1.empty()));
00041 
00042     //Get the mins of inOct1
00043     ot::TreeNode* mins = new ot::TreeNode[npes];
00044     assert(mins);
00045     par::Mpi_Allgather<ot::TreeNode>(&(*(inOct1.begin())), mins, 1, comm);
00046 
00047     //Distribute inOct2 to align with inOct1
00048     int* sendCnts = new int[npes];
00049     assert(sendCnts);
00050     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00051       sendCnts[i] = 0;
00052     }//end for i 
00053 
00054     if(!(inOct2.empty())) {
00055       //Since inOct1 is complete and sorted, mins[0] is a deepest first
00056       //decendant of root.
00057       //Since inOct2 is also complete and sorted, on the first non-empty processor
00058       //inOct2[0] will also be a deepest first decendant of root.
00059       //Now mins[0] can be an ancestor, decendant or equal to inOct2[0] (global
00060       //first element, so only happens on the first processor). So i=0
00061       //is handled separately. 
00062       int minsCnt = 0;
00063       if(inOct2[0] < mins[0]) {
00064         sendCnts[0]++;
00065       } else {
00066         while( (minsCnt < npes) && (mins[minsCnt] <= inOct2[0]) ) {
00067           minsCnt++;
00068         }
00069         sendCnts[minsCnt - 1]++;
00070       }
00071       for(int i = 1; i < inOct2.size(); i++) {
00072         while( (minsCnt < npes) && (mins[minsCnt] <= inOct2[i]) ) {
00073           minsCnt++;
00074         }
00075         sendCnts[minsCnt - 1]++;
00076       }//end for i
00077     }
00078 
00079     int* recvCnts = new int[npes];
00080     assert(recvCnts);
00081 
00082     par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(sendCnts, recvCnts, 1, comm);
00083 
00084     int* sendDisps = new int[npes];
00085     assert(sendDisps);
00086 
00087     int* recvDisps = new int[npes];
00088     assert(recvDisps);
00089 
00090     sendDisps[0] = 0;
00091     recvDisps[0] = 0;
00092     for(int i = 1; i < npes; i++) {
00093       sendDisps[i] = sendDisps[i - 1] + sendCnts[i - 1];
00094       recvDisps[i] = recvDisps[i - 1] + recvCnts[i - 1];
00095     }//end for i
00096 
00097     outOct.resize(recvDisps[npes - 1] + recvCnts[npes - 1]);
00098 
00099     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<ot::TreeNode>(&(*(inOct2.begin())), sendCnts, sendDisps,
00100         &(*(outOct.begin())), recvCnts, recvDisps, comm);
00101 
00102     delete [] mins;
00103     delete [] sendCnts;
00104     delete [] sendDisps;
00105     delete [] recvCnts;
00106     delete [] recvDisps;
00107 
00108     //Merge outOct and inOct1 locally
00109     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpOct;
00110     int cnt1 = 0;
00111     int cnt2 = 0;
00112     while( (cnt1 < inOct1.size()) && (cnt2 < outOct.size()) ) {
00113       if(inOct1[cnt1] < outOct[cnt2]) {
00114         tmpOct.push_back(inOct1[cnt1]);
00115         cnt1++;
00116       } else {
00117         tmpOct.push_back(outOct[cnt2]);
00118         cnt2++;
00119       }
00120     }
00121 
00122     while(cnt1 < inOct1.size()) {
00123       tmpOct.push_back(inOct1[cnt1]);
00124       cnt1++;
00125     }
00126 
00127     while(cnt2 < outOct.size()) {
00128       tmpOct.push_back(outOct[cnt2]);
00129       cnt2++;
00130     }
00131 
00132     outOct = tmpOct;
00133     tmpOct.clear();
00134 
00135     //Linearize outOct. This will remove duplicates and ancestors
00136     lineariseList(outOct, comm);
00137 
00138     PROF_MERGE_OCTREES_END
00139   }//end function

00141   int refineOctree(const std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & inp,
00142       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> &out) {
00143     out.clear();
00144     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < inp.size(); i++) {
00145       if(inp[i].getLevel() < inp[i].getMaxDepth()) {
00146         inp[i].addChildren(out);
00147       } else {
00148         out.push_back(inp[i]);
00149       }
00150     }
00151     return 1;
00152   }//end function

00154   int refineAndPartitionOctree(const std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & inp,
00155       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> &out, MPI_Comm comm) {
00156     refineOctree(inp,out);
00157     par::partitionW<ot::TreeNode>(out, NULL,comm);
00158     return 1;
00159   }//end function

00161   int createRegularOctree(std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& out, unsigned int lev, 
00162       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth, MPI_Comm comm) {
00163     TreeNode root(dim,maxDepth);
00164     out.clear();
00165     int rank;
00166     MPI_Comm_rank(comm,&rank);
00167     if(!rank) {
00168       out.push_back(root);
00169     }
00170     for(int i = 0; i < lev; i++) {
00171       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmp;
00172       refineAndPartitionOctree(out,tmp,comm);
00173       out = tmp;
00174       tmp.clear();
00175     }
00176     return 1;
00177   }

00179   //list must be sorted.
00180   int lineariseList(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & list, bool skipLast) {
00181     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmp;
00182     if(!(list.empty())) {
00183       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (list.size()-1); i++) {
00184 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00185         assert(areComparable(list[i], list[i+1]));
00186 #endif
00187         if( (!(list[i].isAncestor(list[i+1]))) && (list[i] != list[i+1]) ) {
00188           tmp.push_back(list[i]);
00189         }
00190       }
00191       if(!skipLast) {
00192         tmp.push_back(list[list.size()-1]);
00193       }
00194     }
00195 
00196     list = tmp;
00197     tmp.clear();
00198     return 1;
00199   }//end fn.
00200 
00201   //list must be sorted.
00202   int lineariseList(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & list, MPI_Comm comm) {
00203     int rank,size;
00204     MPI_Comm_rank(comm,&rank);
00205     MPI_Comm_size(comm,&size);
00206 
00207     if(size == 1) {
00208       lineariseList(list, false);
00209       return 1;
00210     }
00211 
00212     //Remove empty processors...
00213     int new_rank, new_size; 
00214     MPI_Comm   new_comm;
00215     par::splitComm2way(list.empty(), &new_comm,comm);
00216 
00217     MPI_Comm_rank (new_comm, &new_rank);
00218     MPI_Comm_size (new_comm, &new_size);
00219     if(!list.empty()) {
00220       //Send the last octant to the next processor. 
00221       ot::TreeNode lastOctant = list[list.size()-1];
00222       ot::TreeNode lastOnPrev;
00223 
00224       MPI_Request recvRequest;
00225       MPI_Request sendRequest;
00226 
00227       if(new_rank) {
00228         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::TreeNode>( &lastOnPrev, 1, new_rank-1, 1, new_comm, &recvRequest);
00229       }
00230       if(new_rank < (new_size-1)) {
00231         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::TreeNode>( &lastOctant, 1, new_rank+1, 1, new_comm,  &sendRequest);
00232       }
00233 
00234       if(new_rank) {
00235         std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmp(list.size()+1);
00236         for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
00237           tmp[i+1] = list[i];
00238         }
00239 
00240         MPI_Status statusWait;
00241         MPI_Wait(&recvRequest, &statusWait);
00242         tmp[0] = lastOnPrev;
00243 
00244         list = tmp;
00245         tmp.clear();
00246       }
00247 
00248       if(new_rank == (new_size-1)) {
00249         lineariseList(list, false);
00250       }else {
00251         lineariseList(list, true);
00252       }
00253 
00254       if(new_rank < (new_size-1)) {
00255         MPI_Status statusWait;
00256         MPI_Wait(&sendRequest, &statusWait);
00257       }      
00258     }//not empty procs only
00259 
00260     return 1;
00261   }//end fn.

00263   bool lessThanUsingWts ( TreeNode  const & a,  TreeNode  const & b)  {
00264     if(a == b){
00265       return (a.getWeight() < b.getWeight());
00266     }else {
00267       return (a < b);
00268     }
00269   }//end function

00275   bool bPartComparator(TreeNode a, TreeNode b) {
00276     if ( (a.getWeight()) != (b.getWeight()) ) {
00277       //pick denser
00278       return( (a.getWeight()) > (b.getWeight()) );
00279     } else if (a.getWeight() > 1) {
00280       //pick finer
00281       return( (a.getLevel()) > (b.getLevel()) );
00282     } else {
00283       //pick coarser
00284       return( (a.getLevel()) < (b.getLevel()) );
00285     }
00286   }//end function

00288   //If one of first and second is an ancestor of the other, it is returned.  
00289   TreeNode getNCA(TreeNode first, TreeNode second) {
00290 #ifdef __DEBUG_OCT__
00291     assert(areComparable(first,second));
00292     assert(first != second);
00293 #endif
00294     unsigned int fx = first.getX();
00295     unsigned int sx = second.getX();
00296     unsigned int fy = first.getY();
00297     unsigned int sy = second.getY();
00298     unsigned int fz = first.getZ();
00299     unsigned int sz = second.getZ();
00300     unsigned int maxDepth = first.getMaxDepth(); 
00301     unsigned int dim = first.getDim(); 
00302     unsigned int maxDiff = (unsigned int)(std::max((std::max((fx^sx),(fy^sy))),(fz^sz)));
00303     unsigned int maxDiffBinLen = binOp::binLength(maxDiff);
00304     //Eliminate the last maxDiffBinLen bits.
00305     unsigned int ncaX = ((fx>>maxDiffBinLen)<<maxDiffBinLen);
00306     unsigned int ncaY = ((fy>>maxDiffBinLen)<<maxDiffBinLen);
00307     unsigned int ncaZ = ((fz>>maxDiffBinLen)<<maxDiffBinLen);
00308     unsigned int ncaLev = (maxDepth - maxDiffBinLen);
00309     TreeNode nca(ncaX,ncaY,ncaZ,ncaLev,dim,maxDepth);
00310     return nca;
00311   }//end function

00313   int readPtsFromFile(char* filename, std::vector<double>& pts) {
00314     FILE* infile;
00315     infile = fopen(filename,"rb");
00316     unsigned int temp;
00317     fread(&temp,sizeof(unsigned int),1,infile);
00318 
00319     double* ptsTemp = NULL;
00320 
00321     if(temp) {
00322       ptsTemp = new double[3*temp];
00323       assert(ptsTemp);
00324       fread(ptsTemp, sizeof(double),3*temp,infile);
00325     }
00326 
00327     fclose(infile);
00328     pts.resize(3*temp);
00329 
00330     for (int i=0; i < (3*temp); i++) {
00331       pts[i] = ptsTemp[i];
00332     }//end for
00333 
00334     if(ptsTemp) {
00335       delete [] ptsTemp;
00336       ptsTemp = NULL;
00337     }
00338 
00339     return 1;
00340   }//end function

00342   int readDataPtsFromFile(char* filename, std::vector<double>& pts,
00343       std::vector<double>& ptVals) {
00344     // file format:
00345     // 4 bytes (unsigned int?)  number of points N
00346     // 3*N*8 bytes coordinates of point (double);  X1 Y1 Z1 X2 Y2 Z2 ....
00347     // N*8 weights attached to points (double)
00348     // 
00349     FILE* infile;
00350     unsigned int temp;
00351 
00352     assert(sizeof(double)==8);
00353     assert(sizeof(unsigned int)==4);
00354 
00355     infile = fopen(filename,"rb");
00356     fread(&temp,sizeof(unsigned int),1,infile);
00357 
00358     pts.resize(3*temp);
00359     ptVals.resize(temp);
00360 
00361     fread(&(pts[0]), sizeof(double),3*temp,infile);
00362     fread(&(ptVals[0]), sizeof(double),temp,infile);
00363 
00364     fclose(infile);
00365 
00366     return 1;
00367   }//end function

00369   int writePtsToFile(char* filename, std::vector<double>& pts) {
00370     FILE* outfile = fopen(filename,"wb");
00371     unsigned int ptsLen = pts.size();
00372     double * ptsTemp = NULL;
00373     if(!pts.empty()) {
00374       ptsTemp = (&(*(pts.begin())));
00375     }
00376 
00377     if (ptsLen >0) {
00378       unsigned int numPts = ptsLen/3;
00379       fwrite(&numPts,sizeof(unsigned int),1,outfile);
00380       fwrite(ptsTemp, sizeof(double),ptsLen,outfile);
00381     }
00382     fclose(outfile);
00383     return 1;
00384   }//end function

00400   }//end function

00402   int readNodesFromFile (char* filename, std::vector<TreeNode > & nodes) {
00403     FILE* infile = fopen(filename,"r");
00404     unsigned int numNode;
00405     unsigned int dim, maxDepth;
00406     fscanf(infile,"%u",&dim);
00407     fscanf(infile,"%u",&maxDepth); 
00408     fscanf(infile,"%u",&numNode);
00409     nodes.resize(numNode) ;   
00410 
00411     for (unsigned int i =0; i< nodes.size(); i++) {
00412       unsigned int x,y,z,d;
00413       fscanf(infile,"%u",&x);
00414       fscanf(infile,"%u",&y);
00415       fscanf(infile,"%u",&z);
00416       fscanf(infile,"%u",&d); 
00417       nodes[i] = ot::TreeNode (x,y,z,d, dim, maxDepth);
00418     }
00419     fclose(infile);
00420     return 1;
00421   }//end function

00423   int writeNodesToFile (char* filename, const std::vector<TreeNode> & nodes) {
00424     FILE* outfile = fopen(filename,"w");
00425     if (!nodes.empty()) {
00426       unsigned int dim = nodes[0].getDim();
00427       unsigned int maxDepth = nodes[0].getMaxDepth();
00428       fprintf(outfile,"%u %u\n",dim,maxDepth); 
00429       fprintf(outfile,"%u\n",static_cast<unsigned int>(nodes.size()));
00430       for (unsigned int i =0; i< nodes.size(); i++) {
00431         assert(nodes[i].getDim() == dim);
00432         assert(nodes[i].getMaxDepth() == maxDepth);
00433         fprintf(outfile,"%u %u %u %u\n",nodes[i].getX(),nodes[i].getY(),nodes[i].getZ(),nodes[i].getLevel());
00434       }
00435     }
00436     fclose(outfile);
00437     return 1;
00438   }//end function

00440   bool areComparable (TreeNode first, TreeNode second) {
00441     return( ( (first.getDim()) == (second.getDim()) ) && ( (first.getMaxDepth()) == (second.getMaxDepth()) ) );
00442   }

00444   int int2str(int n,char*s) {
00445     int tmpd[20];
00446     int i=0;
00447     int j;   
00448     if (n==0) {
00449       strcpy(s,"0\0");
00450     } else {
00451       while (n>0) {
00452         tmpd[i]= (n%10);
00453         n= (int)(n/10);
00454         i++;
00455       }
00456       for (j=i-1;j>=0;j--) {
00457         s[i-j-1]=int2char(tmpd[j]);
00458       }
00459       s[i]='\0';
00460     }
00461     return 1;
00462   }//end function

00464   char int2char(int d) {
00465     switch (d) {
00466       case 0: return '0';
00467       case 1: return '1';
00468       case 2: return '2';
00469       case 3: return '3';
00470       case 4: return '4';
00471       case 5: return '5';
00472       case 6: return '6';
00473       case 7: return '7';
00474       case 8: return '8';
00475       case 9: return '9';
00476       default: return '\0';
00477     }
00478   }//end function

00480   // This will add boundary nodes and will also embed the octree one level higher
00481   // to enable the addition of the boundary nodes.
00482   void addBoundaryNodesType2(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> &in, 
00483       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& bdy, 
00484       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00485 
00486     PROF_ADD_BDY_BEGIN
00487       assert(bdy.empty());
00488 
00489     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
00490       // get basic info ...
00491       unsigned int d   = in[i].getLevel();
00492       unsigned int x = in[i].getX();
00493       unsigned int y = in[i].getY();
00494       unsigned int z = in[i].getZ();
00495 
00496       unsigned char bdyFlags;
00497       // check if this is a boundary octant or not ...
00498       if ( in[i].isBoundaryOctant(ot::TreeNode::POSITIVE, &bdyFlags) ) {
00499         // bdy flags tells us which octants to add ...
00500 
00501         //NOTE: == is important since a&(b+c) will be true if
00502         //a=b, a=c and a=b+c
00503 
00504         // +x and more ... add additional octant in +x dir
00505         if ( bdyFlags & ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY ) {
00506           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode( (1u << maxDepth), y, z, (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00507         }
00508 
00509         // +y and more ... add additional octant in +y dir
00510         if ( bdyFlags & ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY ) {
00511           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode(x, (1u << maxDepth), z,
00512                 (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00513         }
00514 
00515         // +z and more ... add additional octant in +z dir
00516         if ( bdyFlags & ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY ) {
00517           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode(x, y, (1u << maxDepth),
00518                 (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00519         }
00520 
00521         //+x+y and more
00522         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY)) == 
00523             (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY) ) { 
00524           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode((1u << maxDepth),(1u << maxDepth), z,
00525                 (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00526         }
00527 
00528         //+x+z and more
00529         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY)) ==
00530             (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY) ) {
00531           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode((1u << maxDepth), y, (1u << maxDepth),
00532                 (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00533         }
00534 
00535         //+y+z and more
00536         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY)) == 
00537             (ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY) ) {
00538           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode(x, (1u << maxDepth), (1u << maxDepth),
00539                 (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00540         }
00541 
00542         // if global corner ...
00543         //+x +y and +z only
00544         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY +
00545                 ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY)) == (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY +
00546                 ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY +  ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY) ) {
00547           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode((1u << maxDepth), (1u << maxDepth), (1u << maxDepth),
00548                 (d+1), dim, maxDepth+1));
00549         }
00550       }//end if boundary
00551 
00552       // Embed the actual octant in one level higher ...
00553       in[i] = ot::TreeNode(x, y, z, d+1, dim, maxDepth+1);
00554 
00555     }//end for i
00556 
00557     // A Parallel Sort for the bdy nodes follows.  
00558     //Then in and bdy will be merged.
00559 
00560     PROF_ADD_BDY_END
00561   }//end function

00563   void markBoundaryNodesAtAllLevels(std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& finestOctree, unsigned int nlevels,
00564       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>* coarserOctrees, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00565     //coarser octrees
00566     for(int lev = 0; lev < (nlevels - 1); lev++) {
00567       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < coarserOctrees[lev].size(); i++) {
00568         unsigned int myX = coarserOctrees[lev][i].getX();
00569         unsigned int myY = coarserOctrees[lev][i].getY();
00570         unsigned int myZ = coarserOctrees[lev][i].getZ();
00571         if( (myX == (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ||
00572             (myY == (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ||
00573             (myZ == (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ) {
00574           coarserOctrees[lev][i].orFlag(ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY);
00575         }
00576       }//end for i
00577     }//end for lev
00578 
00579     //finest octree
00580     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < finestOctree.size(); i++) {
00581       unsigned int myX = finestOctree[i].getX();
00582       unsigned int myY = finestOctree[i].getY();
00583       unsigned int myZ = finestOctree[i].getZ();
00584       if( (myX == (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ||
00585           (myY == (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ||
00586           (myZ == (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ) {
00587         finestOctree[i].orFlag(ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY);
00588       }
00589     }//end for i
00590 
00591   }//end function
00592 
00593   void discardExtraBoundaryOctants(std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& in,
00594       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00595 
00596     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpOctree;
00597     for(int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
00598       unsigned int myX = in[i].getX();
00599       unsigned int myY = in[i].getY();
00600       unsigned int myZ = in[i].getZ();
00601       if( (myX <= (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) &&
00602           (myY <= (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) &&
00603           (myZ <= (1u << (maxDepth - 1))) ) {
00604         tmpOctree.push_back(in[i]);
00605       }
00606     }//end for i
00607 
00608     if(tmpOctree.size() < in.size()) {
00609       in = tmpOctree;
00610     }
00611   }//end function
00612 
00613   //A simple implementation for now. This just calls flagNodesType3 for all
00614   //levels. A smarter implementation would use the fact that regular coarse
00615   //grid nodes remain regular on all finer octrees 
00616   void markHangingNodesAtAllLevels(std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& finestOctree, unsigned int nlevels, 
00617       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>* coarserOctrees, MPI_Comm* activeComms,
00618       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00619 
00620     for(int lev = 0; lev < (nlevels - 1); lev++) {
00621       if( !(coarserOctrees[lev].empty()) ) {
00622         ot::flagNodesType3(coarserOctrees[lev], activeComms[lev + 1]);
00623       }
00624     }//end for lev
00625 
00626     if( !(finestOctree.empty()) ) {
00627       ot::flagNodesType3(finestOctree, activeComms[0]);
00628     }
00629 
00630   }//end function
00631 
00632   // This will add boundary nodes and will also embed the octree one level higher
00633   // to enable the addition of the boundary nodes. The positive boundary nodes
00634   // are also marked as BOUNDARY.
00635   void addBoundaryNodesType1(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> &in, 
00636       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& bdy, 
00637       unsigned int dim, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00638     PROF_ADD_BDY_BEGIN
00639 
00640       assert(bdy.empty());
00641 
00642     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
00643       // get basic info ...
00644       unsigned int d   = in[i].getLevel();
00645       unsigned int x = in[i].getX();
00646       unsigned int y = in[i].getY();
00647       unsigned int z = in[i].getZ();
00648 
00649       unsigned char bdyFlags;
00650       // check if this is a boundary octant or not ...
00651       if ( in[i].isBoundaryOctant(ot::TreeNode::POSITIVE, &bdyFlags) ) {
00652         // bdy flags tells us which octants to add ...
00653 
00654         //NOTE: == is important since a&(b+c) will be true if
00655         //a=b, a=c and a=b+c
00656 
00657         // +x and more ... add additional octant in +x dir
00658         if ( bdyFlags & ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY ) {
00659           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode( (1u << maxDepth), y, z, (d+1) |
00660                 ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00661         }
00662 
00663         // +y and more ... add additional octant in +y dir
00664         if ( bdyFlags & ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY ) {
00665           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode(x, (1u << maxDepth), z,
00666                 (d+1) | ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00667         }
00668 
00669         // +z and more ... add additional octant in +z dir
00670         if ( bdyFlags & ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY ) {
00671           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode(x, y, (1u << maxDepth),
00672                 (d+1) | ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00673         }
00674 
00675         //+x+y and more
00676         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY)) == 
00677             (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY) ) { 
00678           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode((1u << maxDepth),(1u << maxDepth), z,
00679                 (d+1) | ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00680         }
00681 
00682         //+x+z and more
00683         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY)) ==
00684             (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY) ) {
00685           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode((1u << maxDepth), y, (1u << maxDepth),
00686                 (d+1) | ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00687         }
00688 
00689         //+y+z and more
00690         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY)) == 
00691             (ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY) ) {
00692           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode(x, (1u << maxDepth),(1u << maxDepth),
00693                 (d+1) | ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00694         }
00695 
00696         // if global corner ...
00697         //+x +y and +z only
00698         if ( (bdyFlags & (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY + ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY +
00699                 ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY)) == (ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY +
00700                 ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY +  ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY) ) {
00701           bdy.push_back(ot::TreeNode((1u << maxDepth), (1u << maxDepth), (1u << maxDepth),
00702                 (d+1) | ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY, dim, maxDepth+1));
00703         }
00704       }//end if boundary
00705 
00706       // Embed the actual octant in one level higher ...
00707       in[i] = ot::TreeNode(x, y, z, d+1, dim, maxDepth+1);
00708 
00709     }//end for i
00710 
00711     // A Parallel Sort for the bdy nodes follows in the constructor.  
00712     //Then in and bdy will be merged.
00713 
00714     PROF_ADD_BDY_END
00715   }//end function
00716 
00717   void flagNodesType1(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & in, MPI_Comm comm) {
00718 
00719 #ifdef __PROF_WITH_BARRIER__
00720     MPI_Barrier(comm);
00721 #endif
00722 
00723     PROF_MARK_HANGING_BEGIN
00724 
00725       PROF_FLN_STAGE1_BEGIN
00726 
00727       int npes;
00728     int rank;
00729 
00730     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00731     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00732 
00733     std::vector<unsigned int > keysCount(in.size());
00734     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > keys;
00735 
00736     assert(!in.empty());
00737     unsigned int maxD = in[0].getMaxDepth();
00738     unsigned int dim  = in[0].getDim();
00739     ot::TreeNode* inPtr = (&(*(in.begin())));
00740 
00741     //1. Generate Keys
00742     for (int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
00743       keysCount[i] = 0;
00744       unsigned int myLev = inPtr[i].getLevel();
00745       if (myLev == 1) {
00746         continue;
00747       }
00748       unsigned int childNum = inPtr[i].getChildNumber();   
00749       unsigned int mySz = (1u << (maxD - myLev));
00750       unsigned int myX = inPtr[i].getX();
00751       unsigned int myY = inPtr[i].getY();
00752       unsigned int myZ = inPtr[i].getZ();    
00753 
00754       switch (childNum) {
00755         case 0:
00756           {
00757             break;
00758           }
00759         case 7:
00760           {
00761             break;
00762           }
00763         case 1:
00764           {
00765             //-y,-z,-yz
00766             if (myY) {
00767               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00768               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00769               keysCount[i]++;
00770             }
00771             if (myZ) {
00772               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
00773               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00774               keysCount[i]++;
00775             }
00776             if (myY && myZ) {
00777               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);         
00778               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00779               keysCount[i]++;
00780             }
00781             break;
00782           }
00783         case 2:
00784           {
00785             //-x,-z,-xz
00786             if (myX) {
00787               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00788               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00789               keysCount[i]++;
00790             }
00791             if (myZ) {
00792               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
00793               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00794               keysCount[i]++;
00795             }
00796             if (myX && myZ) {
00797               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
00798               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00799               keysCount[i]++;
00800             }
00801             break;
00802           }
00803         case 3:
00804           {
00805             //-z
00806             if (myZ) {
00807               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
00808               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00809               keysCount[i]++;
00810             }
00811             break;
00812           }
00813         case 4:
00814           {
00815             //-x,-y,-xy
00816             if (myX) {
00817               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00818               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00819               keysCount[i]++;
00820             }
00821             if (myY) {
00822               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00823               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00824               keysCount[i]++;
00825             }
00826             if (myX && myY) {
00827               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00828               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00829               keysCount[i]++;
00830             }
00831             break;
00832           }
00833         case 5:
00834           {
00835             //-y
00836             if (myY) {
00837               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00838               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
00839               keysCount[i]++;
00840             }
00841             break;
00842           }
00843         case 6:
00844           {
00845             //-x
00846             if (myX) {
00847               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
00848               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());    
00849               keysCount[i]++;
00850             }
00851             break;      
00852           }
00853         default: assert(false);
00854       }//end switch
00855     }//end for i        
00856 
00857     PROF_FLN_STAGE1_END
00858       PROF_FLN_STAGE2_BEGIN
00859 
00860       // allocate memory for the mins array
00861       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> mins(npes);
00862 
00863     par::Mpi_Allgather<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr, &(*(mins.begin())), 1, comm);
00864 
00865     unsigned int *part = NULL;
00866     if(!keys.empty()) {
00867       part = new unsigned int[keys.size()];    
00868       assert(part);
00869     }
00870 
00871     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys.size(); i++) {
00872       unsigned int idx;
00873       //maxLB returns the last index in a sorted array
00874       //such that a[ind] <= key and  a[index +1] > key
00875       bool found = seq::maxLowerBound<TreeNode >(mins, keys[i], idx, NULL, NULL);
00876       if (!found ) {
00877         part[i] = rank;
00878       } else {
00879         part[i] = idx;
00880       }
00881     }//end for i
00882     mins.clear();
00883 
00884     PROF_FLN_STAGE2_END
00885       PROF_FLN_STAGE3_BEGIN
00886 
00887       int *numKeysSend = new int[npes];
00888     assert(numKeysSend);
00889 
00890     int *numKeysRecv = new int[npes];
00891     assert(numKeysRecv);
00892     for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00893       numKeysSend[i] = 0;
00894     }
00895 
00896     // calculate the number of keys to send ...
00897     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys.size(); i++) {
00898       assert(part[i] < npes);
00899       numKeysSend[part[i]]++;
00900     }
00901 
00902     // Now do an All2All to get inumKeysRecv
00903     par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(numKeysSend, numKeysRecv, 1, comm);
00904 
00905     unsigned int totalKeys=0; // total number of local keys ...
00906     for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00907       totalKeys += numKeysRecv[i];
00908     }
00909 
00910 #ifdef __MEASURE_FLAG_NODES__
00911     MPI_Barrier(comm);
00912     int numProcsSend = 0;
00913     int numProcsRecv = 0;
00914     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00915       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
00916         numProcsSend++;
00917       }
00918       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
00919         numProcsRecv++;
00920       }
00921     }//end for i
00922     int* allNumProcsSend = new int[npes];
00923     assert(allNumProcsSend);
00924 
00925     int* allNumProcsRecv = new int[npes];
00926     assert(allNumProcsRecv);
00927 
00928     unsigned int* allKeysSz = new unsigned int[npes];
00929     assert(allKeysSz);
00930 
00931     unsigned int* allTotalRecv = new unsigned int[npes]; 
00932     assert(allTotalRecv);
00933 
00934     unsigned int localKeysSize = keys.size(); 
00935     par::Mpi_Gather<int>(&numProcsSend, allNumProcsSend, 1, 0, comm);
00936     par::Mpi_Gather<int>(&numProcsRecv, allNumProcsRecv, 1, 0, comm);
00937     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&localKeysSize, allKeysSz, 1, 0, comm);
00938     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&totalKeys, allTotalRecv, 1, 0, comm);
00939     if(!rank) {
00940       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00941         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allNumProcsSend["<<i<<"] = "<<allNumProcsSend[i]<<std::endl;
00942         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allNumProcsRecv["<<i<<"] = "<<allNumProcsRecv[i]<<std::endl;
00943         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allKeysSz["<<i<<"] = "<<allKeysSz[i]<<std::endl;
00944         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allTotalRecv["<<i<<"] = "<<allTotalRecv[i]<<std::endl;
00945       }//end for i
00946     }
00947 
00948     delete [] allNumProcsSend;
00949     delete [] allNumProcsRecv;
00950     delete [] allKeysSz;
00951     delete [] allTotalRecv;
00952     MPI_Barrier(comm);
00953 #endif
00954 
00955     // create the send and recv buffers ...
00956     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> sendK (keys.size());
00957     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> recvK (totalKeys);
00958     // the mapping ..
00959     unsigned int * comm_map = NULL;
00960     if(!keys.empty()) {
00961       comm_map = new unsigned int [keys.size()];
00962       assert(comm_map);
00963     }
00964 
00965     // Now create sendK
00966     int *sendOffsets = new int[npes]; 
00967     assert(sendOffsets);
00968     sendOffsets[0] = 0;
00969 
00970     int *recvOffsets = new int[npes]; 
00971     assert(recvOffsets);
00972     recvOffsets[0] = 0;
00973 
00974     int *numKeysTmp = new int[npes]; 
00975     assert(numKeysTmp);
00976     numKeysTmp[0] = 0; 
00977 
00978     // compute offsets ...
00979     for (int i = 1; i < npes; i++) {
00980       sendOffsets[i] = sendOffsets[i-1] + numKeysSend[i-1];
00981       recvOffsets[i] = recvOffsets[i-1] + numKeysRecv[i-1];
00982       numKeysTmp[i] = 0; 
00983     }
00984 
00985     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys.size(); i++) {
00986       unsigned int ni = numKeysTmp[part[i]];
00987       numKeysTmp[part[i]]++;
00988       // set entry ...
00989       assert((sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni) < keys.size());
00990       sendK[sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni] = keys[i];
00991       // save mapping .. will need it later ...
00992       comm_map[i] = sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni;
00993     }
00994     unsigned int keysSz = keys.size();
00995     keys.clear();
00996 
00997     if(part) {
00998       delete [] part;
00999       part = NULL;
01000     }
01001 
01002     delete [] numKeysTmp;
01003     numKeysTmp = NULL;
01004 
01005     ot::TreeNode* sendKptr = NULL;
01006     ot::TreeNode* recvKptr = NULL;
01007     if(!sendK.empty()) {
01008       sendKptr = &(*(sendK.begin()));
01009     }
01010     if(!recvK.empty()) {
01011       recvKptr = &(*(recvK.begin()));
01012     }
01013 
01014     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<ot::TreeNode>(sendKptr, numKeysSend, sendOffsets,
01015         recvKptr, numKeysRecv, recvOffsets, comm);
01016 
01017     sendK.clear();
01018 
01019     PROF_FLN_STAGE3_END
01020       PROF_FLN_STAGE4_BEGIN
01021 
01022       std::vector<char>  resSend (totalKeys);
01023     std::vector<char>  resRecv (keysSz);
01024 
01025     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < totalKeys; i++) {
01026       unsigned int idx;
01027       resSend[i] = static_cast<char>(
01028           seq::BinarySearch<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr,
01029             in.size(),  recvK[i], &idx)) ;   
01030     }//end for i
01031     recvK.clear();
01032 
01033     PROF_FLN_STAGE4_END
01034       PROF_FLN_STAGE5_BEGIN
01035 
01036       char* resSendPtr = NULL;
01037     char* resRecvPtr = NULL;
01038     if(!resSend.empty()) {
01039       resSendPtr = &(*(resSend.begin()));
01040     }
01041     if(!resRecv.empty()) {
01042       resRecvPtr = &(*(resRecv.begin()));
01043     }
01044 
01045     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<char>( resSendPtr, numKeysRecv, recvOffsets, 
01046         resRecvPtr, numKeysSend, sendOffsets, comm);
01047 
01048     resSend.clear();
01049 
01050     delete [] sendOffsets;
01051     sendOffsets = NULL;
01052 
01053     delete [] recvOffsets;
01054     recvOffsets = NULL;
01055 
01056     delete [] numKeysSend;
01057     numKeysSend = NULL;
01058 
01059     delete [] numKeysRecv;
01060     numKeysRecv = NULL;
01061 
01062     unsigned int st = 0;
01063     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01064       bool isHanging = false;
01065       for (unsigned int k = 0; k < keysCount[i]; k++) {
01066         assert(comm_map[st + k] < resRecv.size());
01067         if (resRecv[comm_map[st + k]]) {
01068           isHanging = true;
01069           break;
01070         }
01071       }//end for k
01072       if (!isHanging) {
01073         in[i].orFlag(ot::TreeNode::NODE);
01074       }
01075       st += keysCount[i];
01076     }//end for i
01077     assert(st == keysSz);
01078     // Clean up ...
01079     if(comm_map) {
01080       delete [] comm_map; 
01081       comm_map = NULL;
01082     }
01083 
01084     resRecv.clear();
01085 
01086     PROF_FLN_STAGE5_END
01087 
01088       PROF_MARK_HANGING_END
01089   }//end function
01090 
01091 
01092   void flagNodesType2(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & in, MPI_Comm comm) {
01093 
01094 #ifdef __PROF_WITH_BARRIER__
01095     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01096 #endif
01097 
01098     PROF_MARK_HANGING_BEGIN
01099 
01100       PROF_FLN_STAGE1_BEGIN
01101 
01102       int npes;
01103     int rank;
01104 
01105     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01106     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01107 
01108     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > keys;
01109 
01110     assert(!in.empty());
01111     unsigned int maxD = in[0].getMaxDepth();
01112     unsigned int dim  = in[0].getDim();
01113 
01114     ot::TreeNode* inPtr = (&(*in.begin()));
01115 
01116     //1. Generate Keys
01117     //Only true octants need to generate keys. Pseudo-octants don't generate keys.
01118     //This is because the positive boundary nodes can only be edge-hanging, they
01119     //can't be face hanging. And the edge hanging node will be identified by the
01120     //key generated by the true element instead
01121     for (int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01122       unsigned int myLev = inPtr[i].getLevel();
01123       if (myLev == maxD) {
01124         continue;
01125       }
01126       unsigned int mySz = (1u << (maxD - myLev));
01127       unsigned int myX = inPtr[i].getX();
01128       unsigned int myY = inPtr[i].getY();
01129       unsigned int myZ = inPtr[i].getZ();    
01130 
01131       if( (myX + mySz) <= (1u << (maxD-1)) ) {
01132         //Add C6 of my +x neighbour (Face Hanging)
01133         TreeNode tmp6x((myX + mySz), (myY + (mySz>>1)), (myZ + (mySz>>1)), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01134         keys.push_back(tmp6x);
01135 
01136         //Add C4 of my +x neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01137         TreeNode tmp4x((myX + mySz), myY, (myZ + (mySz>>1)), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01138         keys.push_back(tmp4x);
01139 
01140         //Add C2 of my +x neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01141         TreeNode tmp2x((myX + mySz), (myY + (mySz>>1)), myZ, (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01142         keys.push_back(tmp2x);
01143 
01144         if( (myY + mySz) <= (1u << (maxD-1)) ) {
01145           //Add C4 of my +xy neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01146           TreeNode tmp4xy((myX + mySz), (myY + mySz), (myZ + (mySz>>1)), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01147           keys.push_back(tmp4xy);
01148         }
01149 
01150         if( (myZ + mySz) <= (1u << (maxD-1)) ) {
01151           //Add C2 of my +xz neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01152           TreeNode tmp2xz((myX + mySz), (myY + (mySz>>1)), (myZ + mySz), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01153           keys.push_back(tmp2xz);
01154         }
01155       } 
01156 
01157       if( (myY + mySz) <= (1u << (maxD-1)) ) {
01158         //Add C5 of my +y neighbour (Face Hanging)
01159         TreeNode tmp5y((myX + (mySz>>1)), (myY + mySz), (myZ + (mySz>>1)), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01160         keys.push_back(tmp5y);
01161 
01162         //Add C1 of my +y neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01163         TreeNode tmp1y((myX + (mySz>>1)), (myY + mySz), myZ, (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01164         keys.push_back(tmp1y);
01165 
01166         //Add C4 of my +y neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01167         TreeNode tmp4y(myX, (myY + mySz), (myZ + (mySz>>1)), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01168         keys.push_back(tmp4y);
01169 
01170         if( (myZ + mySz) <= (1u << (maxD-1)) ) {
01171           //Add C1 of my +yz neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01172           TreeNode tmp1yz((myX + (mySz>>1)), (myY + mySz), (myZ + mySz), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01173           keys.push_back(tmp1yz);
01174         }
01175       } 
01176 
01177       if( (myZ + mySz) <= (1u << (maxD-1)) ) {
01178         //Add C3 of my +z neighbour (Face Hanging)
01179         TreeNode tmp3z((myX + (mySz>>1)), (myY + (mySz>>1)), (myZ + mySz), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01180         keys.push_back(tmp3z);
01181 
01182         //Add C1 of my +z neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01183         TreeNode tmp1z((myX + (mySz>>1)), myY, (myZ + mySz), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01184         keys.push_back(tmp1z);
01185 
01186         //Add C2 of my +z neighbour (Edge Hanging)
01187         TreeNode tmp2z(myX, (myY + (mySz>>1)), (myZ + mySz), (myLev + 1), dim, maxD);
01188         keys.push_back(tmp2z);
01189       }
01190     }//end for i        
01191 
01192 #ifdef __MEASURE_FLAG_NODES__
01193     unsigned int forwardKeysCount = 0;
01194     for (int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01195       unsigned int myLev = inPtr[i].getLevel();
01196       if (myLev == 1) {
01197         continue;
01198       }
01199       unsigned int childNum = inPtr[i].getChildNumber();   
01200       unsigned int mySz = (1u << (maxD - myLev));
01201       unsigned int myX = inPtr[i].getX();
01202       unsigned int myY = inPtr[i].getY();
01203       unsigned int myZ = inPtr[i].getZ();    
01204 
01205       switch (childNum) {
01206         case 0:
01207           {
01208             break;
01209           }
01210         case 7:
01211           {
01212             break;
01213           }
01214         case 1:
01215           {
01216             //-y,-z,-yz
01217             if (myY) {
01218               forwardKeysCount++;
01219             }
01220             if (myZ) {
01221               forwardKeysCount++;
01222             }
01223             if (myY && myZ) {
01224               forwardKeysCount++;
01225             }
01226             break;
01227           }
01228         case 2:
01229           {
01230             //-x,-z,-xz
01231             if (myX) {
01232               forwardKeysCount++;
01233             }
01234             if (myZ) {
01235               forwardKeysCount++;
01236             }
01237             if (myX && myZ) {
01238               forwardKeysCount++;
01239             }
01240             break;
01241           }
01242         case 3:
01243           {
01244             //-z
01245             if (myZ) {
01246               forwardKeysCount++;
01247             }
01248             break;
01249           }
01250         case 4:
01251           {
01252             //-x,-y,-xy
01253             if (myX) {
01254               forwardKeysCount++;
01255             }
01256             if (myY) {
01257               forwardKeysCount++;
01258             }
01259             if (myX && myY) {
01260               forwardKeysCount++;
01261             }
01262             break;
01263           }
01264         case 5:
01265           {
01266             //-y
01267             if (myY) {
01268               forwardKeysCount++;
01269             }
01270             break;
01271           }
01272         case 6:
01273           {
01274             //-x
01275             if (myX) {
01276               forwardKeysCount++;
01277             }
01278             break;      
01279           }
01280         default: assert(false);
01281       }//end switch
01282     }//end for i        
01283 #endif
01284 
01285     PROF_FLN_STAGE1_END
01286       PROF_FLN_STAGE2_BEGIN
01287 
01288 #ifdef __MEASURE_FLAG_NODES__
01289       unsigned int keysSzBefore = keys.size();
01290 #endif
01291 
01292     //Make keys sorted and unique locally. There could still be duplicates
01293     //globally and keys need not be globally sorted
01294     seq::makeVectorUnique<ot::TreeNode>(keys, false);
01295 
01296 #ifdef __MEASURE_FLAG_NODES__
01297     unsigned int keysSzAfter = keys.size();
01298     unsigned int* allKeysSzBefore = new unsigned int[npes];
01299     unsigned int* allKeysSzAfter = new unsigned int[npes];
01300     unsigned int* allForwardKeysCount = new unsigned int[npes];
01301     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&keysSzBefore, allKeysSzBefore, 1, 0, comm);
01302     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&keysSzAfter, allKeysSzAfter, 1, 0, comm);
01303     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&forwardKeysCount, allForwardKeysCount, 1, 0, comm);
01304     if(!rank) {
01305       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01306         std::cout<<"rank = "<<i<<"keys Before = "<<allKeysSzBefore[i]
01307           <<" After = "<<allKeysSzAfter[i]
01308           <<" Forward = "<<allForwardKeysCount[i]
01309           <<std::endl; 
01310       }//end for i
01311     }
01312     delete [] allKeysSzBefore;
01313     delete [] allKeysSzAfter;
01314     delete [] allForwardKeysCount;
01315     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01316 #endif
01317 
01318     PROF_FLN_STAGE2_END
01319       PROF_FLN_STAGE3_BEGIN
01320 
01321       // allocate memory for the mins array
01322       ot::TreeNode* mins = new ot::TreeNode[npes];
01323     assert(mins);
01324 
01325     par::Mpi_Allgather<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr, mins, 1, comm);
01326     //Mins will be sorted and unique
01327 
01328     MPI_Request* requests = new MPI_Request[npes<<1];
01329     assert(requests);
01330     ot::TreeNode* keysPtr = NULL;
01331     if(!(keys.empty())) {
01332       keysPtr = (&(*keys.begin()));
01333     }
01334 
01335     int* sendOffsets = new int[npes];
01336     assert(sendOffsets);
01337     int* sendCounts = new int[npes];
01338     assert(sendCounts);
01339     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01340       sendOffsets[i] = 0;
01341       sendCounts[i] = 0;
01342     }
01343 
01344     for(int i = 0; i < (npes - 1); i++) {
01345       for(int j = sendOffsets[i]; j < keys.size(); j++) {
01346         if(keysPtr[j] >= mins[i+1]) {
01347           break;
01348         } else {
01349           sendCounts[i]++;
01350         }
01351       }
01352       sendOffsets[i + 1] = (sendOffsets[i] + sendCounts[i]);
01353     }//end for i
01354 
01355     sendCounts[npes - 1] = (keys.size() - sendOffsets[npes - 1]);
01356 
01357     delete [] mins;
01358 
01359     int* recvCounts = new int[npes];
01360     assert(recvCounts);
01361     par::Mpi_Alltoall(sendCounts, recvCounts, 1, comm); 
01362 
01363     std::vector<ot::TreeNode>* recvNodes = new std::vector<ot::TreeNode>[npes];
01364     assert(recvNodes);
01365     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01366       recvNodes[i].resize(recvCounts[i]);
01367     }//end for i
01368 
01369     //Post Recvs
01370     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01371       if(recvCounts[i]) {
01372         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::TreeNode>( (&(*((recvNodes[i]).begin()))) , recvCounts[i],
01373             i, 1, comm, (requests + (i<<1)) );
01374       }
01375     }//end for i
01376 
01377     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01378       if(recvCounts[i]) {
01379         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::TreeNode>( (&(*((recvNodes[i]).begin()))) , recvCounts[i],
01380             i, 1, comm, (requests + (i<<1)) );
01381       }
01382     }//end for i
01383 
01384     //Post Sends
01385     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01386       if(sendCounts[i]) {
01387         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::TreeNode>( (keysPtr + sendOffsets[i]), sendCounts[i], 
01388             i, 1, comm, (requests + ((i<<1) + 1)) );
01389       }
01390     }//end for i
01391 
01392     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01393       if(sendCounts[i]) {
01394         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::TreeNode>( (keysPtr + sendOffsets[i]), sendCounts[i], 
01395             i, 1, comm, (requests + ((i<<1) + 1)) );
01396       }
01397     }//end for i
01398 
01399     PROF_FLN_STAGE3_END
01400       PROF_FLN_STAGE4_BEGIN
01401 
01402       bool* isHanging = new bool[in.size()];
01403     assert(isHanging);
01404     for(int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01405       isHanging[i] = false; 
01406     }//end for i
01407 
01408     for(int i = sendOffsets[rank]; i < (sendOffsets[rank] + sendCounts[rank]); i++) {
01409       unsigned int retIdx;
01410       bool found =  seq::BinarySearch(inPtr, in.size(), keysPtr[i], &retIdx);
01411       if(found) {
01412         //hanging
01413         isHanging[retIdx] = true;
01414       }
01415     }//end for i
01416 
01417     delete [] sendOffsets;
01418 
01419     PROF_FLN_STAGE4_END
01420       PROF_FLN_STAGE5_BEGIN
01421 
01422       //Wait for the recvs to complete
01423       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01424         if(recvCounts[i]) {
01425           MPI_Status status;
01426           MPI_Wait( (requests + (i<<1)), &status);
01427         }
01428       }//end for i
01429 
01430     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01431       if(recvCounts[i]) {
01432         MPI_Status status;
01433         MPI_Wait( (requests + (i<<1)), &status);
01434       }
01435     }//end for i
01436 
01437     PROF_FLN_STAGE5_END
01438       PROF_FLN_STAGE6_BEGIN
01439 
01440       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01441         for(int j = 0; j < recvCounts[i]; j++) {
01442           unsigned int retIdx;
01443           bool found =  seq::BinarySearch(inPtr, in.size(), recvNodes[i][j], &retIdx);
01444           if(found) {
01445             //hanging
01446             isHanging[retIdx] = true;
01447           }
01448         }//end for j
01449       }//end for i
01450 
01451     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01452       for(int j = 0; j < recvCounts[i]; j++) {
01453         unsigned int retIdx;
01454         bool found =  seq::BinarySearch(inPtr, in.size(), recvNodes[i][j], &retIdx);
01455         if(found) {
01456           //hanging
01457           isHanging[retIdx] = true;
01458         }
01459       }//end for j
01460     }//end for i
01461 
01462     for(int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01463       if(!isHanging[i]) {
01464         inPtr[i].orFlag(ot::TreeNode::NODE);
01465       } 
01466     }//end for i
01467 
01468     delete [] isHanging;
01469     delete [] recvNodes;
01470     delete [] recvCounts;
01471 
01472     PROF_FLN_STAGE6_END
01473       PROF_FLN_STAGE7_BEGIN
01474 
01475       //Wait for the sends to complete
01476       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01477         if(sendCounts[i]) {
01478           MPI_Status status;
01479           MPI_Wait( (requests + ((i<<1) + 1)), &status);
01480         }
01481       }//end for i
01482 
01483     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01484       if(sendCounts[i]) {
01485         MPI_Status status;
01486         MPI_Wait( (requests + ((i<<1) + 1)), &status);
01487       }
01488     }//end for i
01489 
01490     keys.clear();
01491     delete [] sendCounts;
01492     delete [] requests;
01493 
01494     PROF_FLN_STAGE7_END
01495 
01496       PROF_MARK_HANGING_END
01497 
01498   }//end function
01499 
01500   void flagNodesType3(std::vector<ot::TreeNode> & in, MPI_Comm comm) {
01501 
01502 #ifdef __PROF_WITH_BARRIER__
01503     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01504 #endif
01505 
01506     PROF_MARK_HANGING_BEGIN
01507 
01508       PROF_FLN_STAGE1_BEGIN
01509 
01510       int npes;
01511     int rank;
01512 
01513     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01514     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01515 
01516     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > keys;
01517 
01518     assert(!in.empty());
01519     unsigned int maxD = in[0].getMaxDepth();
01520     unsigned int dim  = in[0].getDim();
01521     ot::TreeNode* inPtr = (&(*(in.begin())));
01522 
01523     //1. Generate Keys
01524     for (int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01525       //keysCount[i] = 0;
01526       unsigned int myLev = inPtr[i].getLevel();
01527       if (myLev == 1) {
01528         continue;
01529       }
01530       unsigned int currKeySz = static_cast<unsigned int>(keys.size());
01531       unsigned int childNum = inPtr[i].getChildNumber();   
01532       unsigned int mySz = (1u << (maxD - myLev));
01533       unsigned int myX = inPtr[i].getX();
01534       unsigned int myY = inPtr[i].getY();
01535       unsigned int myZ = inPtr[i].getZ();    
01536 
01537       switch (childNum) {
01538         case 0:
01539           {
01540             break;
01541           }
01542         case 7:
01543           {
01544             break;
01545           }
01546         case 1:
01547           {
01548             //-y,-z,-yz
01549             if (myY) {
01550               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01551               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01552             }
01553             if (myZ) {
01554               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
01555               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01556             }
01557             if (myY && myZ) {
01558               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);         
01559               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01560             }
01561             break;
01562           }
01563         case 2:
01564           {
01565             //-x,-z,-xz
01566             if (myX) {
01567               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01568               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01569             }
01570             if (myZ) {
01571               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
01572               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01573             }
01574             if (myX && myZ) {
01575               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
01576               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01577             }
01578             break;
01579           }
01580         case 3:
01581           {
01582             //-z
01583             if (myZ) {
01584               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY,myZ-mySz,myLev,dim,maxD);
01585               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01586             }
01587             break;
01588           }
01589         case 4:
01590           {
01591             //-x,-y,-xy
01592             if (myX) {
01593               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01594               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01595             }
01596             if (myY) {
01597               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01598               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01599             }
01600             if (myX && myY) {
01601               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01602               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01603             }
01604             break;
01605           }
01606         case 5:
01607           {
01608             //-y
01609             if (myY) {
01610               TreeNode tmp(myX,myY-mySz,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01611               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());
01612             }
01613             break;
01614           }
01615         case 6:
01616           {
01617             //-x
01618             if (myX) {
01619               TreeNode tmp(myX-mySz,myY,myZ,myLev,dim,maxD);
01620               keys.push_back(tmp.getParent());    
01621             }
01622             break;      
01623           }
01624         default: assert(false);
01625       }//end switch
01626       for(int  j = currKeySz; j < keys.size(); j++) {
01627         keys[j].setWeight(i);
01628       }//end for j 
01629     }//end for i        
01630 
01631     PROF_FLN_STAGE1_END
01632 
01633 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01634       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01635     if(!rank) {
01636       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 1 passed."<<std::endl;
01637     }
01638     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01639 #endif
01640 
01641     PROF_FLN_STAGE2_BEGIN
01642 
01643       // allocate memory for the mins array
01644       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> mins(npes);
01645 
01646     par::Mpi_Allgather<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr, (&(*(mins.begin()))), 1, comm);
01647 
01648     unsigned int *part = NULL;
01649     if(!keys.empty()) {
01650       part = new unsigned int[keys.size()];    
01651       assert(part);
01652     }
01653 
01654     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys.size(); i++) {
01655       unsigned int idx;
01656       //maxLB returns the last index in a sorted array
01657       //such that a[ind] <= key and  a[index +1] > key
01658       bool found = seq::maxLowerBound<TreeNode >(mins, keys[i], idx, NULL, NULL);
01659       if (!found ) {
01660         part[i] = rank;
01661       } else {
01662         part[i] = idx;
01663       }
01664     }//end for i
01665     mins.clear();
01666 
01667     PROF_FLN_STAGE2_END 
01668 
01669 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01670       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01671     if(!rank) {
01672       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 2 passed."<<std::endl;
01673     }
01674     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01675 #endif
01676 
01677     PROF_FLN_STAGE3_BEGIN
01678 
01679       int *numKeysSend = new int[npes];
01680     int *numKeysRecv = new int[npes];
01681     for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01682       numKeysSend[i] = 0;
01683     }
01684 
01685     // calculate the number of keys to send ...
01686     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys.size(); i++) {
01687       assert(part[i] < npes);
01688       numKeysSend[part[i]]++;
01689     }
01690 
01691     // Now do an All2All to get inumKeysRecv
01692     par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(numKeysSend, numKeysRecv, 1, comm);
01693 
01694     unsigned int totalKeys=0; // total number of local keys ...
01695     for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01696       totalKeys += numKeysRecv[i];
01697     }
01698 
01699 #ifdef __MEASURE_FLAG_NODES__
01700     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01701     int numProcsSend = 0;
01702     int numProcsRecv = 0;
01703     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01704       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01705         numProcsSend++;
01706       }
01707       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01708         numProcsRecv++;
01709       }
01710     }//end for i
01711     int* allNumProcsSend = new int[npes];
01712     int* allNumProcsRecv = new int[npes];
01713     unsigned int* allKeysSz = new unsigned int[npes];
01714     unsigned int* allTotalRecv = new unsigned int[npes]; 
01715     unsigned int localKeysSize = keys.size(); 
01716     par::Mpi_Gather<int>(&numProcsSend, allNumProcsSend, 1, 0, comm);
01717     par::Mpi_Gather<int>(&numProcsRecv, allNumProcsRecv, 1, 0, comm);
01718     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&localKeysSize, allKeysSz, 1, 0, comm);
01719     par::Mpi_Gather<unsigned int>(&totalKeys, allTotalRecv, 1, 0, comm);
01720     if(!rank) {
01721       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01722         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allNumProcsSend["<<i<<"] = "<<allNumProcsSend[i]<<std::endl;
01723         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allNumProcsRecv["<<i<<"] = "<<allNumProcsRecv[i]<<std::endl;
01724         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allKeysSz["<<i<<"] = "<<allKeysSz[i]<<std::endl;
01725         std::cout<<"In Flag Nodes:  allTotalRecv["<<i<<"] = "<<allTotalRecv[i]<<std::endl;
01726       }//end for i
01727     }
01728 
01729     delete [] allNumProcsSend;
01730     delete [] allNumProcsRecv;
01731     delete [] allKeysSz;
01732     delete [] allTotalRecv;
01733     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01734 #endif
01735 
01736     // create the send and recv buffers ...
01737     ot::TreeNode* sendK = NULL;
01738     if(!(keys.empty())) {
01739       sendK = new ot::TreeNode[keys.size()];
01740     }
01741 
01742     ot::TreeNode* recvK = NULL;
01743     if(totalKeys) {
01744       recvK = new ot::TreeNode[totalKeys];
01745     }
01746 
01747     // the mapping ..
01748     unsigned int* comm_map = NULL;
01749     if(!keys.empty()) {
01750       comm_map = new unsigned int[keys.size()];
01751     }
01752 
01753     // Now create sendK
01754     int *sendOffsets = new int[npes]; sendOffsets[0] = 0;
01755     int *recvOffsets = new int[npes]; recvOffsets[0] = 0;
01756     int *numKeysTmp = new int[npes]; numKeysTmp[0] = 0; 
01757 
01758     // compute offsets ...
01759     for (int i = 1; i < npes; i++) {
01760       sendOffsets[i] = sendOffsets[i-1] + numKeysSend[i-1];
01761       recvOffsets[i] = recvOffsets[i-1] + numKeysRecv[i-1];
01762       numKeysTmp[i] = 0; 
01763     }
01764 
01765     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys.size(); i++) {
01766       unsigned int ni = numKeysTmp[part[i]];
01767       numKeysTmp[part[i]]++;
01768       // set entry ...
01769       assert((sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni) < keys.size());
01770       sendK[sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni] = keys[i];
01771       // save mapping .. will need it later ...
01772       comm_map[sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni] = keys[i].getWeight();
01773     }
01774     unsigned int keysSz = keys.size();
01775     keys.clear();
01776 
01777     if(part) {
01778       delete [] part;
01779       part = NULL;
01780     }
01781 
01782     delete [] numKeysTmp;
01783     numKeysTmp = NULL;
01784 
01785     MPI_Request* requests1 = new MPI_Request[npes<<1];
01786 
01787     //Post Recvs
01788     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01789       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01790         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::TreeNode>( (recvK + recvOffsets[i]) , numKeysRecv[i],
01791             i, 1, comm, (requests1 + (i<<1)) );
01792       }
01793     }//end for i
01794 
01795     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01796       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01797         par::Mpi_Irecv<ot::TreeNode>( (recvK + recvOffsets[i]) , numKeysRecv[i],
01798             i, 1, comm, (requests1 + (i<<1)) );
01799       }
01800     }//end for i
01801 
01802     //Post Sends
01803     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01804       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01805         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::TreeNode>( (sendK + sendOffsets[i]), numKeysSend[i], 
01806             i, 1, comm, (requests1 + ((i<<1) + 1)) );
01807       }
01808     }//end for i
01809 
01810     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01811       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01812         par::Mpi_Issend<ot::TreeNode>( (sendK + sendOffsets[i]), numKeysSend[i], 
01813             i, 1, comm, (requests1 + ((i<<1) + 1)) );
01814       }
01815     }//end for i
01816 
01817     PROF_FLN_STAGE3_END
01818 
01819 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01820       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01821     if(!rank) {
01822       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 3 passed."<<std::endl;
01823     }
01824     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01825 #endif
01826 
01827     PROF_FLN_STAGE4_BEGIN
01828 
01829       bool* resSend = NULL;
01830     if(totalKeys) {
01831       resSend = new bool[totalKeys];
01832     }
01833 
01834     bool* resRecv = NULL;
01835     if(keysSz) {
01836       resRecv = new bool[keysSz];
01837     }
01838 
01839     for (unsigned int i = sendOffsets[rank];
01840         i < (sendOffsets[rank] + numKeysSend[rank]); i++) {
01841       unsigned int idx;
01842       resSend[recvOffsets[rank] + (i - sendOffsets[rank])] =
01843         seq::BinarySearch<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr, in.size(), sendK[i], &idx);   
01844     }//end for i
01845 
01846     PROF_FLN_STAGE4_END 
01847 
01848 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01849       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01850     if(!rank) {
01851       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 4 passed."<<std::endl;
01852     }
01853     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01854 #endif
01855 
01856     PROF_FLN_STAGE5_BEGIN
01857 
01858       //Wait for the recvs to complete
01859       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01860         if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01861           MPI_Status status;
01862           MPI_Wait( (requests1 + (i<<1)), &status);
01863         }
01864       }//end for i
01865 
01866     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01867       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01868         MPI_Status status;
01869         MPI_Wait( (requests1 + (i<<1)), &status);
01870       }
01871     }//end for i
01872 
01873     PROF_FLN_STAGE5_END 
01874 
01875 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01876       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01877     if(!rank) {
01878       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 5 passed."<<std::endl;
01879     }
01880     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01881 #endif
01882 
01883     PROF_FLN_STAGE6_BEGIN
01884 
01885       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < recvOffsets[rank]; i++) {
01886         unsigned int idx;
01887         resSend[i] = seq::BinarySearch<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr, in.size(), recvK[i], &idx);   
01888       }//end for i
01889 
01890     for (unsigned int i = (recvOffsets[rank] + numKeysRecv[rank]); i < totalKeys; i++) {
01891       unsigned int idx;
01892       resSend[i] = seq::BinarySearch<ot::TreeNode>(inPtr, in.size(), recvK[i], &idx);   
01893     }//end for i
01894 
01895     PROF_FLN_STAGE6_END
01896 
01897 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01898       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01899     if(!rank) {
01900       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 6 passed."<<std::endl;
01901     }
01902     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01903 #endif
01904 
01905     PROF_FLN_STAGE7_BEGIN
01906 
01907       MPI_Request* requests2 = new MPI_Request[npes<<1];
01908 
01909     //Post Recvs
01910     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01911       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01912         par::Mpi_Irecv<bool>( (resRecv + sendOffsets[i]) , numKeysSend[i],
01913             i, 1, comm, (requests2 + (i<<1)) );
01914       }
01915     }//end for i
01916 
01917     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01918       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01919         par::Mpi_Irecv<bool>( (resRecv + sendOffsets[i]) , numKeysSend[i],
01920             i, 1, comm, (requests2 + (i<<1)) );
01921       }
01922     }//end for i
01923 
01924     //Post Sends
01925     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01926       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01927         par::Mpi_Issend<bool>( (resSend + recvOffsets[i]), numKeysRecv[i], 
01928             i, 1, comm, (requests2 + ((i<<1) + 1)) );
01929       }
01930     }//end for i
01931 
01932     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01933       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
01934         par::Mpi_Issend<bool>( (resSend + recvOffsets[i]), numKeysRecv[i], 
01935             i, 1, comm, (requests2 + ((i<<1) + 1)) );
01936       }
01937     }//end for i
01938 
01939     PROF_FLN_STAGE7_END
01940 
01941 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01942       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01943     if(!rank) {
01944       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 7 passed."<<std::endl;
01945     }
01946     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01947 #endif
01948 
01949     PROF_FLN_STAGE8_BEGIN
01950       bool* isHanging = new bool[in.size()];
01951     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
01952       isHanging[i] = false;
01953     }//end for i
01954 
01955     for(int i = recvOffsets[rank]; i < (recvOffsets[rank] + numKeysRecv[rank]); i++) {
01956       if(resSend[i]) {
01957         isHanging[comm_map[sendOffsets[rank] + i - recvOffsets[rank]]] = true;
01958       }
01959     }//end for i
01960 
01961     PROF_FLN_STAGE8_END
01962 
01963 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01964       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01965     if(!rank) {
01966       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 8 passed."<<std::endl;
01967     }
01968     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01969 #endif
01970 
01971     PROF_FLN_STAGE9_BEGIN
01972 
01973       //wait for recvs
01974       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
01975         if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01976           MPI_Status status;
01977           MPI_Wait( (requests2 + (i<<1)), &status);
01978         }
01979       }//end for i
01980 
01981     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
01982       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
01983         MPI_Status status;
01984         MPI_Wait( (requests2 + (i<<1)), &status);
01985       }
01986     }//end for i
01987 
01988     PROF_FLN_STAGE9_END
01989 
01990 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
01991       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01992     if(!rank) {
01993       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 9 passed."<<std::endl;
01994     }
01995     MPI_Barrier(comm);
01996 #endif
01997 
01998     PROF_FLN_STAGE10_BEGIN
01999 
02000       for(int i = 0; i < sendOffsets[rank]; i++) {
02001         if(resRecv[i]) {
02002           isHanging[comm_map[i]] = true;
02003         }
02004       }//end for i
02005 
02006     for(int i = (sendOffsets[rank] + numKeysSend[rank]); i < keysSz; i++) {
02007       if(resRecv[i]) {
02008         isHanging[comm_map[i]] = true;
02009       }
02010     }//end for i
02011 
02012     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < in.size(); i++) {
02013       if (!isHanging[i]) {
02014         in[i].orFlag(ot::TreeNode::NODE);
02015       }
02016     }//end for i
02017 
02018     PROF_FLN_STAGE10_END
02019 
02020 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
02021       MPI_Barrier(comm);
02022     if(!rank) {
02023       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 10 passed."<<std::endl;
02024     }
02025     MPI_Barrier(comm);
02026 #endif
02027 
02028     PROF_FLN_STAGE11_BEGIN
02029 
02030       //Wait for the sends to complete
02031       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
02032         if(numKeysSend[i]) {
02033           MPI_Status status;
02034           MPI_Wait( (requests1 + ((i<<1) + 1)), &status);
02035         }
02036       }//end for i
02037 
02038     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
02039       if(numKeysSend[i]) {
02040         MPI_Status status;
02041         MPI_Wait( (requests1 + ((i<<1) + 1)), &status);
02042       }
02043     }//end for i
02044 
02045     for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
02046       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
02047         MPI_Status status;
02048         MPI_Wait( (requests2 + ((i<<1) + 1)), &status);
02049       }
02050     }//end for i
02051 
02052     for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
02053       if(numKeysRecv[i]) {
02054         MPI_Status status;
02055         MPI_Wait( (requests2 + ((i<<1) + 1)), &status);
02056       }
02057     }//end for i
02058 
02059     // Clean up ...
02060     if(comm_map) {
02061       delete [] comm_map; 
02062     }
02063 
02064     if(resRecv) {
02065       delete [] resRecv;
02066     }
02067 
02068     if(resSend) {
02069       delete []resSend;
02070     }
02071 
02072     if(sendK) {
02073       delete [] sendK;
02074     }
02075 
02076     if(recvK) {
02077       delete [] recvK;
02078     }
02079 
02080     delete [] sendOffsets;
02081     delete [] recvOffsets;
02082     delete [] numKeysSend;
02083     delete [] numKeysRecv;
02084     delete [] requests1;
02085     delete [] requests2;
02086 
02087     PROF_FLN_STAGE11_END
02088 
02089 #ifdef __DEBUG_DA_PUBLIC__
02090       MPI_Barrier(comm);
02091     if(!rank) {
02092       std::cout<<"FLN Stage 11 passed."<<std::endl;
02093     }
02094     MPI_Barrier(comm);
02095 #endif
02096 
02097     PROF_MARK_HANGING_END
02098   }//end function
